posts.Title: Tesla's AI Day delivers a real Optimus prototype and more FSD updates
posts.Description: Tesla's AI Day is a yearly event where the company showcases upcoming technologies and lays out its roadmap for future development.
posts.Author: Jimmy Pezzone

posts.Title: iPhone 14 Pro owners discover more problems in the latest Apple flagship
posts.Description: More issues for Apple to fix
posts.Author: Rob Thubron

posts.Title: GTA 6 leakers may be the target of an FBI investigation
posts.Description: The recent GTA 6 gameplay leaks may go down as one of the biggest leaks in gaming history.
posts.Author: Matt Frusher
